entry.title: API - scheduled deletion of deprecated API routes (GET /order/catalog/formatted/cloud)
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 2, 2026, 09:00 - 09:02 UTC

Sep 17, 13:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our API endpoints (https://eu.api.ovh.com, https://ca.api.ovh.com).

Start time : 02/03/2026 09:00 UTC
End time : 02/03/2026 09:02 UTC
Maintenance : Scheduled deletion of deprecated API routes will be performed.
Service impact : Impacted API routes are GET /order/catalog/formatted/cloud.
Service improvement : The deprecated API routes are replaced by a new API route that provide the same level of features:

Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Customer Service] - Support maintenance notification

Nov 15, 08:38 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 15, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 10, 09:39 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Support offer.

Start time : 15/11/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 15/11/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Help Center, Community portals and Live Chat access could be temporally degraded due to possible disconnection during this maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will update the application to improve security and stability.
Workaround : Help Center and Community portal should remain accessible during the operation.
If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency.
You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU][Control panel] - Customer Panel incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 22, 09:46 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Control panel has been resolved.

Start time : 22/09/2025 08:50 UTC
End time : 22/09/2025 09:21 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 22, 09:09 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Control panel offering, which is causing temporary an access issue.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 22/09/2025 08:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : There are delivery issues with account verification code emails when customers log in to the customer panel.
Customers Impact : Some customers may experience difficulties when connecting to their customer panel.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
